com.influxdb.spring.metrics

Class Influx2MetricsExportAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.influxdb.spring.metrics.Influx2MetricsExportAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @AutoConfigureBefore(value={org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.metrics.CompositeMeterRegistryAutoConfiguration.class,org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.metrics.export.simple.SimpleMetricsExportAutoConfiguration.class})
 @AutoConfigureAfter(value=org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.metrics.MetricsAutoConfiguration.class)
 @ConditionalOnBean(value=io.micrometer.core.instrument.Clock.class)
 @ConditionalOnClass(value=io.micrometer.influx2.Influx2MeterRegistry.class)
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="management.metrics.export.influx2",
                       name="enabled",
                       havingValue="true",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=Influx2Properties.class)
public class Influx2MetricsExportAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto-configuration for exporting metrics to Influx 2.
    Author:
    Jakub Bednar (bednar@github) (06/05/2019 13:32)
